title: Link Alchemy
subtitle: Create stunning QR codes with custom logos and shorten URLs with expiration control

qr.textUrlPlaceholder: Enter text or URL to encode

errors.emptyText: Please enter text or URL to generate QR code
errors.fileTooLarge: Logo file size must be less than 5MB
errors.generateFirst: Please generate a QR code first

warning.title: Conceptual Demo Notice
warning.message: This URL shortener might not actually shorten your URL. This is a conceptual demo that uses a 2-way hash to encode URLs as we don't have the budget to create a separate database for this tool. A proper URL shortener should use a backend database to store URL mappings, generate truly short codes, and provide reliable redirects for all users.
